title: Digital Library for Earth System Education
description: The Digital Library for Earth System Education (DLESE) provides easy access to quality teaching and learning resources about the Earth as a system for a wide range of learners. Resources in DLESE include lesson plans, scientific data, visualisations, interactive computer models, and virtual field trips â€“ in short, any web-accessible teaching or learning material. Learning objects focus on Earth, Geography, Geology and Ocean Science.
